item.title: Arewa Data Science Academy Fellowship: A Transformative Journey to Success in Data Science
item.dc:creator: Lukman Aliyu Jibril
item.description:
The Arewa Data Science Academy fellowship has been an exceptional journey that has profoundly shaped my life this year. In just six months, I have acquired a wealth of knowledge, leaving an indelible mark on my personal and professional growth.

The fellowship’s comprehensive curriculum not only covered programming and data science skills but also delved into vital areas like version control using Git. Engaging and interactive workshops provided me with hands-on experiences that deepened my understanding of this critical aspect of modern software development. Additionally, I honed my expertise in bash scripting and command-line usage, enhancing my technical proficiency.

An extraordinary aspect of the fellowship was its focus on sharing our learning experiences through blogging. With training in using Quarto, I mastered the art of effective scientific writing, perfecting my ability to communicate complex ideas concisely. Blogging not only allowed me to reflect on my progress but also reinforced my understanding of the concepts I was learning, solidifying my grasp on data science principles.

Throughout this transformative journey, our mentors played an indispensable role. Their immense talent and dedication created a supportive and encouraging environment for us to thrive. Regular updates and organization through platforms like Notion, slack and telegram ensured we never missed any valuable insights, keeping us on track and motivated.

Beyond technical skills, the fellowship also emphasized essential aspects of professional development, including crafting an impressive CV. With practical exercises using LaTeX, we learned to create captivating CVs that effectively showcased our capabilities. The mentors’ commitment to providing personalized feedback and constructive criticism proved invaluable in refining our CVs to perfection, preparing us for future career opportunities.

The Arewa Data Science Academy has been an absolute blessing, propelling me beyond the boundaries of my imagination. As a part of this prestigious fellowship, I have gained newfound confidence and a fervor for continuous learning. My technical repertoire has expanded, and I have developed a deeper sense of self-awareness and determination to succeed in the data science field.

Reflecting on my journey as a fellow, I am amazed by how much I have achieved in such a short time. The skills and knowledge I have acquired will undoubtedly pave the way for a bright future in data science, and I am eager to explore the limitless possibilities that lie ahead. The academy has laid a strong foundation for my ongoing pursuit of excellence, inspiring me to keep pushing my boundaries and seeking new challenges.

In conclusion, joining the Arewa Data Science Academy fellowship has been a pivotal moment in my life. It has equipped me with a diverse set of skills, provided a supportive network, and instilled an unwavering passion for continuous growth. I am profoundly grateful for this transformative experience and eagerly anticipate the boundless opportunities that await me on this remarkable path of learning and discovery.

item.title: Arewa Data Science Team Wins Competition
item.dc:creator: Lukman Aliyu Jibril
item.description:
ArewaDS-LMBF, a team from the Arewa Data Science Fellowship, achieved an impressive feat on May 13th, 2023, by securing second place in the Cohere AI hackathon. Organized by Cohere and AI Saturdays Lagos, the hackathon centered around the theme “Empower your creativity with Cohere’s Multilingual Embeddings” and was hosted on devpost. The event spanned from May 1st to May 7th, 2023, with participants gathering at multiple locations across the continent, including the enthusiastic Arewa Data Science Academy community.

The teams representing ArewaDS showcased their expertise in machine learning, particularly in large language models, as they presented their innovative projects utilizing the Cohere multilingual embeddings API. Among the submissions, ArewaDS-LMBF proposed an exceptional solution that utilised the multilingual embeddings API to align Hausa sentences with their potential translations in English. This approach aimed to contribute to the creation of accurate parallel datasets for machine translation. Their outstanding submission propelled them to the finals, securing them a well-deserved second place in the overall rankings.

Lukman, the team lead of ArewaDS-LMBF, expressed his overwhelming delight at this historic achievement. He remarked, “Starting from scratch in machine learning and winning an AI hackathon within a few months of joining the fellowship is truly incredible. The unwavering support of the mentors in Arewa Data Science Academy played a pivotal role in this accomplishment. They ensured equal opportunities for all fellows and guided us to the right resources. I am immensely grateful for this invaluable experience.”

As a reward for their outstanding performance, the team was granted a prize of 800 US Dollars, along with 2000 Cohere API credits, to be shared among the five team members. Looking ahead, the team revealed their plans to further enhance their solution while harnessing the cohere platform to deepen their understanding of Natural Language Processing and Large Language Models. Their commitment to continuous improvement and exploration exemplifies their dedication to excellence.

This accomplishment offers a mere glimpse into the transformative impact that the Arewa Data Science Fellowship has had on the lives of its young fellows within a short span of time. The Arewa Data Science Fellowship stands as an intensive program designed to nurture the next generation of research-oriented data scientists. Through its mentorship, monthly stipends, and provision of data, the fellowship equips aspiring data scientists with the necessary tools to thrive in their field. For more information about the fellowship, please visit our website.

item.title: Arewa Data Science Successful Applicants
item.dc:creator: Shamsuddeen Muhammad
item.description:
Fellowship Successful Applicants

We are thrilled to announce the selection of the first cohort of exceptional applicants for the Arewa Data Science Fellowship program. These individuals have shown exceptional aptitude and passion for data science, and we are confident that they will make significant contributions to the program and to the field of data science as a whole.

The selection process was highly competitive, and we received a large number of excellent applications. We would like to extend our congratulations to all of the successful applicants and we look forward to working with them in the upcoming program.

We are excited to see the impact that this program will have on the data science community and on the career development of these individuals. This fellowship program is a great step towards creating a more inclusive data science community in Nigeria.

The full list of the successful applicants is available here.

In addition to the exceptional training and mentorship they will receive through the Arewa Data Science Fellowship program, successful applicants will also receive a generous monthly stipend and free internet data to ensure they have access to the resources they need to be successful in the program.

Thank you to everyone who applied and we hope to see you again in the next cohort.

item.title: Arewa Data Science Fellowship
item.dc:creator: Shamsuddeen Muhammad
item.description:
ArewaDS Application is Open :::

The Arewa Data Science Fellowship application is open. The Arewa Data Science fellowship (ADSF) provides an opportunity to learn from data scientists and machine learning experts. The fellowship is a 16-week-long free training that provides a hands-on approach to data science, machine learning and deep learning.

The skills and knowledge acquired during the fellowship will help participants pursue careers in data science, machine learning and research. Our goal is to inspire the next generation of researchers in the North and provide them with the tools they need to be successful. The ADSF fellowship provides support with a monthly stipend during the program.

Applications will be judged based on the strength of the motivation of the applicant, academic record, and scholarly potential.

Application is now closed !
